data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Jing-xian, Chen, Hua-yan, Xu, Zai-fu (2011): Notes on the genus Ismarus Haliday (Hymenoptera, Diapriidae) from China. ZooKeys 108: 49-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.108.768, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.108.768
